title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description: Developed a highly responsive, efficient, and scalable front-end for a web application using the React framework.
Implemented Redux to streamline and optimize data flow within the application.
Leveraged WordPress as a CMS, seamlessly integrating it with React through Apollo.
Applied Tailwind CSS, SASS, and Bootstrap to create visually appealing and cohesive user interfaces for the application.
